arts.ttl: Reports indicating that Marcel Sabitzer twisted knee in Leipzig defeat
arts.sum: Marcel Sabitzer twisted his knee in the thirty-third minute of Borussia Dortmund's 0-2 away defeat. The time that he will be missing for Dortmund, and Austria, is unknown, but he will likely be missing their crucial matches.

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig 2-0 Dortmund (15 de Mar., 2025) Resultado Final

arts.ttl: Schlotterbeck: Champions League qualification "almost impossible" for Dortmund
arts.sum: After Saturday's defeat to RB Leipzig, Nico Schlotterback believes it's "almost impossible" for Borussia Dortmund to qualify for the Champions League this season.

arts.ttl: Kovac reacts to another Bundesliga defeat with Dortmund: "A disaster"
arts.sum: Niko Kovac was self-critical after Borussia Dortmund suffered their fourth Bundesliga defeat in six attempts under his stewardship.

arts.ttl: MOTM Poll: Slow Start Sees Borussia Dortmund Lose 2-0 to RB Leipzig
arts.sum: Leipzig opened the scoring 20 minutes into the game, through Xavi Simons, and will feel they could have gone in at half-time with more than a one-goal lead. Dortmund looked really good offensively in the final half hour of the game, but they were unable to put any of their myriad chances away.

arts.ttl: Dortmund rue missed chances as Leipzig move level with fourth-placed Frankfurt
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund rued missed chances as clinical RB Leipzig won 2-0.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | RB Leipzig 2-0 Borussia Dortmund
arts.sum: In a must-win game for both sides, RB Leipzig held off Borussia Dortmund to win for the first time in five Bundesliga games. The first 45 saw Dortmund allow Leipzig…

arts.ttl: Gittens to Chelsea: Dortmund star could be 'REALLY CHEAP'
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund winger Jamie Gittens could be 'really cheap' this summer if his club miss out on the Champions League, according to German media. The Bundesliga slapped a prohibitive price tag of €100 million on his head to deter his suitors, of which there are many, particularly in England.

arts.ttl: Predicted RB Leipzig XI vs Borussia Dortmund: Marco Rose welcomes back key players
arts.sum: Marco Rose is set to welcome two players back to his squad for RB Leipzig’s Bundesliga clash against Borussia Dortmund in the Topspiel on Saturday evening. Lukas Klostermann and Christoph…
